special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Ego, you may have lands you control become 2/2 creatures with haste and indestructible until end of turn. They're still lands.
[+2]: Untap up to two target permanents.
[-4]: Search your library for a permanent card with mana value X or less, where X is the number of lands you control. Put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
[-9]: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample and indestructible. Untap them.
